Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be worth even more to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
